name: treyworks-quiz
description: A lightweight, customizable quiz library for creating interactive quizzes on any website

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && cp src/quiz.js dist/quiz.js && cp src/quiz.css dist/quiz.css
scripts.minify: uglifyjs src/quiz.js -o dist/quiz.min.js && cleancss src/quiz.css -o dist/quiz.min.css

author: Treyworks
